titles.title: Affordable Housing Incentives Act of 2019
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for nonrecognition of gain on real property sold for use as affordable housing.
Affordable Housing Incentives Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Affordable Housing Incentives Act of 2019
This bill allows nonrecognition of gain, for income tax purposes, from the sale of property to public housing agencies for use as affordable housing.
